Muse is a collection of HSWidgets for music apps. Current supported apps are Spotify, Music, and SoundCloud. The Spotify widget is based on [this concept](https://www.reddit.com/r/iOSBeta/comments/i4l00v/spotify_widgets_concept/?utm_source=share&utm_medium=ios_app&utm_name=iossmf) and the Music widget is based on [iOS 14's Music widget](https://www.reddit.com/r/AppleMusic/comments/he5rmv/new_ios_14_music_widgets/).

**iOS 13+ only**

**Features:**

- Song Title, Artist, and Artwork

- Spotify:

 - Next in Queue

 - Song Code

 - Play/Pause Button

- Music and Spotify

 - Recently Played

 - Expandable

School is starts for me today (September 14<sup>th</sup>, 2020) so I have to direct focus towards my studies. Unfortunately, this means I have to keep the focus of development to fixing bugs. I was unable to get the widgets to where I wanted them to be at this time. After the quarter, I will hopefully have enough time to amend this.

**Planned Features:**

- Album art on small size for Spotify

- Forcing Dark/Light Moden

- Setting background to tint color (see Spotify widget concept)

- Progress bar

- Different options for what is displayed in Recently Played section

- Tap widget to open application
